cmdr-novainternet:~$: Nova Prime ░

Quick links: Check out my Linkgarden for quick ways to get in-touch with me. Use the NAV button at the top of this page for everything else.

Musician behind Eyeshadow 2600 FM & PLEXX, self published author writing my next novel, Dissolution Protocol, owner & designer of Second Life store [REVOSA], and long-time webdev turned developer.

... and here's where I keep all of my brain juice:

[NEW] REVOSA Black Tank Top

𐕣 C M D R ░ NOVA 𐕣
28 Sep 2015

My second release for today, and at a much more “natural” time, is the “black” tank top.

Tired of other colors usurping the heir to the throne of darkness? Now you can tell the world how you feel about that with this lady’s tank top!

This top, like my others, comes in six sizes! Extra extra small, extra small, small, medium, large and extra large. If for some reason none of these fit you, I would be more than happy to help out! My customer’s happiness is important, afterall.

Marketplace listing: https://marketplace.secondlife.com/p/REVOSA-Black-Tank-Top/7809868

Inworld store: http://maps.secondlife.com/secondlife/Pisces/172/239/29

[NEW] REVOSA Black Pleated Skirt

𐕣 C M D R ░ NOVA 𐕣
27 Sep 2015

Today I’ve released the very first skirt in the REVOSA clothing line! This particular skirt is black-ish, comes in five the the typical sizes (which were tested on very classic shapes, Maitreya and TMP) and of course, includes an alpha.

Also worn in the photo is my other recent release, the REVOSA Middle Fingers Tank Top, which is a favorite among most of the clothing I’ve made so far!

Stay tuned for more clothing, maybe a dress? We’ll see!

[NEW] REVOSA Middle Fingers Tank Top

𐕣 C M D R ░ NOVA 𐕣
26 Sep 2015

Now you can tell the world just exactly how you feel with this “middle fingers” tank top.

This top comes in five sizes and includes an alpha. The text across the front reads “I WASN’T BORN WITH ENOUGH MIDDLE FINGERS” and is placed atop a goathead pentagram.

For the goth in you that you never let go of, another fantastic addition to the REVOSA clothing line. Tank top is 125 linden, copy, no mod and no trans.

Worn items in photo:
REVOSA Middle Fingers Tank Top
Blueberry Letia (Stoned)
REVOSA CyberLegs
REVOSA Blood Vial Earrings
REVOSA Facial Piercings Set
TRUTH HAIR Tymber
Head - TMP Fierce
Body - Maitreya Lara

[NEW] REVOSA Skulls Zip-up Jacket (Perfect for Halloween!)

𐕣 C M D R ░ NOVA 𐕣
25 Sep 2015

Just in time for Halloween (only a little over a month away, I know!) is the REVOSA Skulls Zip-up Jacket.

This comes in five classic sizes with an included alpha and has been tested on a wide variety of classic sizes and an average sized Maitreya mesh body.

I strayed away from doing fitted mesh for this one because of numerous issues it was producing, although I’m sure there’s at least one size in here that will fit you. If not, give me an IM and I will personally fit a jacket to your body.

Marketplace listing: https://marketplace.secondlife.com/p/REVOSA-Skulls-Zip-up-Jacket/7795030

Inworld store: http://maps.secondlife.com/secondlife/Pisces/172/239/29
